title: BookmarkIt
description: BookmarkIt is a handy app for book lovers so that they don't have to keep looking for a bookmark again when they need one. No more folding corners or keeping books upside down!

title: TxtPolls
description: TxtPolls lets you create text based polls that can be shared anywhere, WhatsApp, Messenger or even SMS! Get started for free.

title: QuickEntry
description: Quick-Entry is an Entry Management System, built for Terna Engineering College. The college as several rooms which require students to write down their details and time of entry on a register. This is a lengthy process and often leads to a long queue. Quick-Entry can make this process easier and quicker. With Quick-Entry, students can enter into any room by scanning their QR code on the provided QR code scanner and all the details about the student will be added to the room's entry list. The entry list can be viewed from the web app by the admin.

title: react-native-navbar-style
description: react-native-navbar-style is a react-native library for styling the bottom navigation bar on Android devices.

title: Avalanche Magazine Website
description: Avalanche is the official annual magazine of Terna Engineering College, Mumbai. Students can post their own articles which will then be verified by a magazine rep. Once verified, the article will appear on the home page.

title: Mathlete
description: Is your Math Good and Fast? Can you solve simple equation in a very short period of time? If so, put yourself into the Ultimate test with Mathlete!
